code: export var DAYS=["mon","tue","wed","thu","fri","sat","sun"];var PL_DAYS_FULL={mon:"Poniedziałek",tue:"Wtorek",wed:"Środa",thu:"Czwartek",fri:"Piatek",sat:"Sobota",sun:"Niedziela"};export var getDayName=function getDayName(en){return PL_DAYS_FULL[en];};var PL_DAYS_SHORT={mon:"PN",tue:"WT",wed:"ŚR",thu:"CZ",fri:"PT",sat:"SB",sun:"ND"};export var getDayShortName=function getDayShortName(en){return PL_DAYS_SHORT[en];};
